channel.title: Jim Hillyer
channel.description: Recent news about Jim Hillyer, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Lethbridge Herald
item.description:
Hillyer may run again in Lethbridge
Jim Hillyer may be seeking a second term as Lethbridge Member of Parliament. Hillyer, who resides in Raymond, would be forced to run in the Medicine Hat riding in the next federal election following the re-alignment of electoral boundaries. However ...

item.title: Mentioned by Canadian Skies
item.description:
Government of Canada invests in safety at Lethbridge Airport
Jim Hillyer, Member of Parliament for Lethbridge, on behalf of the Honourable Lisa Raitt, Minister of Transport, today announced funding for an important safety improvement project at the Lethbridge Airport. The Lethbridge Airport is receiving $187,944, through the Airports Capital Assistance Program (ACAP), ... “The Lethbridge Airport is a vital gateway for local residents, businesses, trade and tourism,” said MP Hillyer. “This funding will enhance the safety of all those who use this airport, especially the communities ...
